document_name: PRODOC_ER and Rehabilitation for Central Mindanao.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Supports communities transitioning from relief to recovery and development, helps restore socio-economic life and enhances the capacity of target communities in resettlement and return areas to fully participate in long-term recovery and development

project_descr: Provision of comprehensive package of basic services, infrastructure, livelihood support and capacity building for Internally Displaced Persons in Central Mindanao
project_title: Early Recovery and Rehabilitation for Mindanao
